values: Unfortunately for you this is not Alix its her good friend and collegue Renee =O) Presently Alix is reading the 6th Harry Potter book that we are fighting over since this morning when she woke up i had already forged 224 pages ahead of her. I plan to finish it tomorrow morning before she even realizes it mwhahahahahaha! So anyway the reason why i'm here updating her journal is because i just did the layout for her since she wanted me to and because i found her original layout to be boring. everything is done to her standards since she didn't understand all the variables and constants that come into play while making and modifying layouts here on Livejournal and any other journal for that matter.... well now that i've made myself to sound like a complete fool heres a picture of the geek thats writing to you: ugly arent i? oh well goodbye i doubt that you shall ever hear from me again =O)fare thee well

My Grandpy bought me a car today!!! Of course ill be paying for some of it and the insurance, but i am so siked! It's an 03' Chevy Cavalier! 33,000 miles, automatic, moonroof, air conditioner, CD player, and more! I got to test drive it and it was amazing! My mom is going to kill him when she finds out, we were only suppose to be lookingfor a car, not buying! The best part about my new car...ITS YELLOW!!! It had a few minor things it needed fixed, (Drivers side window, and remote trunk opener), but after those booboo's are better, the dealer man will drive it to my house where i can look at it and pamper it for 4 months until i get my license!

P.S. OMG!!! I forgot!!! They decided what the musical is going to be next year!!! (Well...sorta) It's gonna be either-

1. 42nd Street or
2. Beauty and the Beast

I dont know which one i want more!!! Either way i have to go out and buy both of the soundtracks to learn the music over the summer!!! FUN! FUN! FUN!

Here's the page with my car if you go quick you might be able to see it before they take it off the site!
http://preowned.ronbouchardsautostores.com/Preowned-Inventory.aspx?InventoryId=3643555

Red Sox played awesome today! It could not have been a better first game for me to see! We shut them out 
8-0 and the weather was amazing! The only bad thing...Johnny Damon wasn't playing and i was right behind center field! I missed staring at that cute butt the whole game! LOL! The hot dog I had was the best hot dog ever!

Thank god I had something to take my mind of all of this recent shit!

Wow i really want to die right now...i can't believe i let myself get screwed over like i did. I don't really know what happened, and i don't care to know. I cried all day today and now that im done i can see how stupid i have been. I was told in the beginning that it all meant nothing, but i still went along with it. I thought i could control my emotions, but apparently i can't. 

I can't compete with her...so i give up on everything.

And stop trying to talk to me about it, because im done.

Quotes-

Hearts will never be practical until they are made unbreakable.
-Wizard of Oz 

If someone you love hurts you cry a river, build a bridge, and get over it.
-Anonymous 

Love begins with a smile, grows with a kiss, and ends with a teardrop.
-Anonymous 

You don't die from a broken heart - you only wish you did.
-Anonymous 

Nothing takes the taste out of peanut butter quite like unrequited love.
-Charlie Brown 




On a happier note: RED SOX TOMOROW!!!!!

I just found out a very juicy piece of information...I wish i could say it here but someone might kill me!!! I know i can keep the secret but it is going to be hard! I hope everything works out! This is just so great!!!

So i went to starburst last night...by myself, but i met up with some really cool people. Marybeth and her bf Kevin, Kat and her bf Nick, and Katie (and i am assuming from all the making out), her bf Tom. lol. So i guess that makes me like the 7th wheel. It def was no fun sitting by myself and watching all of them make out:(...but the fireworks were good. "Sigh". 

Now i would like to congratulate a whole bunch of people who have better lives than me...-

Katie and Tom- Congratulations on the relationship. You guys are so cute togeather and i am so happy for you both.

Kat and Nick- Despite all the drama you guys are really into each other and that is soo cool! I hope you guys last forever!

Marybeth and Kevin- You guys have only been going out for like 3 weeks, but thats great! Have you two kissed yet?

Jen and Robby- Wow how long has it been, like a year! Thats nuts! Stupid freshman!!!

Camille and Alex- You two have been going out for a while and i cant believe he has been able to keep it in his pants! lol. God knows if i was dating you Camille we would be all over eachother all the time!

I am sure there is more but those are really the relationships i admire. All of my relationships this year have sucked ass. LUNENBURG GUYS ARE ASSHOLES!!! Maybe someday people will admire one of my relationships...

Wow so like i was like at the store and there was like this awesome pink suede skirt that i like had to buy. Then my friend Rachel was all like, you cant buy that skirt because i like have that in blue, and i was all like, this skirt will like look better on me than it does you so im gonna like buy it!!! So i like went up to the counter to like buy the skirt and then that bitch got like all up in my face and was like if you buy that skirt i will tell everyone what you did with Randy Porter. And i was all like, bitch no you wouldnt because then i will like tell everyone how your ten thousand dollar Prada bag is a fake! And she was all like, you did not just go there girlfriend!

I was bored so i just wrote that i dont know why. It's kind of funny though if you read the whole thing in a valley girl voice:)
